posts.post_content:
Hi All,

I barely have half the set. so I will not clog up this post with a long want list. I am looking for a few/several (or is it several/few?) to inch closer to "complete". PSA or SGC are fine....as are raw as long as they are in the 2.5/35 to 4/50 grade range.....Thanks in advance to all who may respond and help a fella out......:D:)
Still looking!....Anybody have any 1910 Obaks looking for a new home?
I just post a plea for M101-4 over on the E,M,W side. I figured I would bump this  1910 T212 plea. I am still looking. If you have some, PM me and we can work something out. Thanks....Mike
David Levin ([url]www.gfg.com[/url]) just picked a large collection of 1909 and 1910 Obak tobacco cards.  You can check with him at 310-471-1959 or check his website.
